ABOUT_ME.TEXT:
Hey there, I'm Justin. 
I've always been fascinated by the sight of code – this seemingly random sequence of words, numbers, and symbols that only a few understand. During my time in the military, I started exploring C++ on my own and was amazed by how a few lines of code could bring something to life from nothing. Today, I know that programming offers endless possibilities. It's a continuous journey of learning and discovery. That’s why I’ve made it my goal to learn as much as I can about coding – and to apply that knowledge in real projects. 
Let’s build something amazing together!

SKILL_SET.INTRODUCTION: Skilled in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular, I enjoy building dynamic front-end applications and continuously expanding my knowledge by exploring new technologies.

SKILL_LOGO.LEARN: Also, I'm interested in diving into:

PROJECTS.JOIN_DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.WELCOME: Explore my projects - interactive, responsive, and focused on clean, efficient code.

CONTACT_ME.MOTIVATION: I'm always open to new opportunities and would love to connect with teams looking for a motivated front-end developer. I'm confident in my ability to contribute meaningfully through my technical skills, reliability, and enthusiasm for continuous learning.
